alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 7:17PM PST until February 22 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 2,000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 2,000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Lighter snow accumulations possible down to 1,500 feet in elevation. * WHERE...Del Norte Interior, Northern Humboldt Interior and Southern Humboldt Interior Counties. Highway passes Collier Tunnel on Highway 199 and Lord Ellis and Berry Summits on Highway 299. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult due to slick, snow covered roads. Chain restrictions will be possible over mountain passes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior
